Name: Virginia
description: Virginia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a nipa roofing business in the Philippines. Virginia requested a PHP 38,000 loan through NWTF to buy materials like nipa, bamboo, rattan string and other items to support her nipa roofing business. Virginia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and developing her business to secure her family.
